verses.name: Leviticus 9:20
verses.text: And they put the fat upon the breasts, and he burnt the fat upon the altar:

verses.name: Leviticus 9:21
verses.text: And the breasts and the right shoulder Aaron waved for a wave offering before the Lord; as Moses commanded.

verses.name: Leviticus 9:22
verses.text: And Aaron lifted up his hand toward the people, and blessed them, and came down from offering of the sin offering, and the burnt offering, and peace offerings.

verses.name: Leviticus 9:23
verses.text: And Moses and Aaron went into the tabernacle of the congregation, and came out, and blessed the people: and the glory of the Lord appeared unto all the people.
